lore: At first, the Hounds were domestic creatures, but unfortunately, there are always those who choose to abandon their faithful friends. Luckily, Hounds are perfect hunters with great adaptability that always find a place in any ecosystem.\n\nAlthough the Hell Hound's fiery breath is a powerful weapon, what makes it really dangerous are its magical abilities to strengthen the pack through a mystical union.
menagerieDialog: (It yawns and stretches into a downward dog position.)
Hiss... hiss!\n(You do know you're not a cat, right?)
(It's running around in small circles, wiggling its ass for no reason. Yep, it's a hound all right.)
(It smells of dog sweat. You should tell Nortah to give it a bath before you leave.)
(It often scratches itself with one of its hind legs. Nortah should really check it for fleas.)
name: Hell Hound
